sprouts

Interface WeakAction<O,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - The type of the owner of this action.
    D - The type of the delegate that will be passed to this event handler.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Action<D>, Subscriber

    public interface WeakAction<O,D>
extends Action<D>
    A weak action is an extension of the Action interface which defines a method for clearing the action and a method for retrieving the owner of the action.
    The owner is weakly referenced and determines the lifetime of the action. A library internal cleaner is responsible for removing the action when the owner is garbage collected. It is advised to use the Action.ofWeak(Object, java.util.function.BiConsumer) factory method to create a new weak action which is backed by a tried and test default implementation of this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the action, making it no longer executable.
      java.util.Optional<O> owner()
      Returns an Optional containing the owner of this action.

      • Methods inherited from interface sprouts.Action

        accept, andThen, ofWeak

    • Method Detail

      • owner

        java.util.Optional<O> owner()
        Returns an Optional containing the owner of this action. If the owner is no longer available, then an empty Optional is returned.
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the owner of this action.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the action, making it no longer executable. This method is called by the library internal cleaner when the owner is garbage collected.
        It is not advised to call this method manually, as it may lead to unexpected behavior.
